attributes.action: Introduce a "Work out to help out" scheme to support sport and leisure industry
attributes.additional_details:
In addition of the campaign "Tackling obesity: empowering adults and children to live healthier lives", a "work out to help out" scheme would have a huge impact on local communities helping people to get active to improve health and mental wellbeing. For sport facilities and clubs it will allow a smoother resuming of activities going out of the Covid-19 pandemic.
Importance of physical activity on getting a balanced lifestyle is too often neglected, there should be a national policy for it.
attributes.background: The same than the government implemented in August 2020 the scheme "Eat out to help out" to support pubs & restaurants, it would be an amazing opportunity to do the same with the sport & leisure industry that suffered a lot from the lockdown.
